title: OpenAgents: An Open Platform for Language Agents in the Wild
desc: ChatGPT Plus replica for researcher, developers and general users, 2.5k github stars

title: Lemur: Open Foundation Models for Language Agents
desc: Lemur-70B and Lemur-70B-chat, Open & SOTA Foundation Models for Language Agents

title: Text2Reward: Automated Dense Reward Function Generation for Reinforcement Learning
desc: One of the earliest works on using LLMs for RL reward function generation

title: Instructor Embeddings: One Embedder, Any Task
desc: Over 500k downloads, 1k github stars, and used by 500+ projects, including LangChain, Pytorch serve

title: DS-1000: A Natural and Reliable Benchmark for Data Science Code Generation
desc: 1,000 natural, diverse, realistic data science questions over Python libraries

title: Binder: Binding Language Models in Symbolic Languages
desc: One of the earliest works empowering LLMs with tools: integrating LLM calls in programming languages

title: UnifiedSKG: A Unified Framework for Structured Knowledge Grounding
desc: An overall summary of structure knowledge grounding before LLM era

title: Spider: A Large-Scale Human-Labeled Dataset for Complex and Cross-Domain Semantic Parsing and Text-to-SQL Task
desc: One of the most popular complex text-to-SQL benchmarks with >200 submissions from leading research labs, including Google, Facebook, UCB, CMU, UW
